Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-0861 affecting package glibc for versions less than 2.35-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-0861 affecting package glibc for versions less than 2.35-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package glibc is earlier than 2.35-9, affected by CVE-2026-0861
